name: Roasted Bell Pepper Salsa
author: TJ Lombard
summary: Sweet, tangy, and delicious roasted salsa. I love to eat this with chops or as a side to Mexican dishes.
ingredients: 1  green bell pepper, seeded and halved
1  red bell pepper, seeded and halved
1  yellow bell pepper, seeded and halved
1 tablespoon canola oil, or as needed
directions: Set an oven rack about 4 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler
Place bell peppers on a broiler pan, cut-side-down
Broil in the preheated oven until charred, 5 to 8 minutes
Transfer peppers to a bowl and cover with plastic wrap for 5 minutes
Peel off and discard skin and chop peppers
Combine chopped peppers, Roma tomatoes, green onions, cilantro, jalapeno, garlic, and lime juice in a blender
Refrigerate salsa at least 1 hour before serving
